text: Transfer is a 2010 German science fiction/drama film directed by Damir Lukacevic. The film premiered at the 2010 Austin Fantastic Fest, and opened in German theatres on 22 September 2011. == Cast == * B.J. Britt as Apolain / Hermann * Regine Nehy as Sarah / Anna * Ingrid Andree as Anna * Hans-Michael Rehberg as Hermann * Mehmet Kurtuluş as Laurin * Eric P. Caspar as Werner * Jeanette Hain as Dr. Menzel * as Dr. Menzel senior * Zana Marjanović as Dr. Menzel's assistant == References == == External links == * Category:2010s science fiction drama films Category:German films Category:Films about consciousness transfer Category:German science fiction drama films
title: Transfer (2010 film)
